h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: Expect the Violet Spider to absolutely take advantage of your vulnerability in these moments, attacking with both her talons and a large jump slam attack that even staggers her for a bit. You'll need to stand your ground and use Rock Solid to knock away her blasts if you're unable to dodge them in time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Expect the Violet Spider to absolutely take advantage of your vulnerability in these moments, attacking with both her talons and a large jump slam attack that even staggers her for a bit. You'll need to stand your ground and use Rock Solid to knock away her blasts if you're unable to dodge them in time.
